law.catch_line: Authorized activities of child-caring facilities or child-placing agencies.
law.text: Any licensed child-caring facility or child-placing agency may contract to provide care, maintenance, and services for a child in accordance with the terms of its license. Any licensed child-caring facility or child-placing agency may receive children committed to its custody and provide care and services for the child until the child is discharged from custody pursuant to law.
law.history: Amended 1972 Ky. Acts ch. 153, sec. 3. -- Created 1950 Ky. Acts ch. 125, sec. 28.
